A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
This movie was trash. Complete and utter trash. The John Williams score and beautiful visuals can't redeem the the this film.

The brain dead plot. The uninspiring and underdeveloped characters. The destruction of the beloved OT characters. It pretty much got everything wrong.

The thing that annoyed me the most about the film though is the buying off of the so called professional critics.
